{{title|CLOCKS_PER_SEC}}
{{cpp/chrono/c/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=ctime|
#define CLOCKS_PER_SEC /* implementation-defined */
}}

Expands to an expression (not necessarily a compile-time constant) of type {{lc|std::clock_t}} equal to the number of clock ticks per second, as returned by {{lc|std::clock()}}. 

===Notes===
POSIX defines [https://pubs.opengroup.org/onlinepubs/9799919799/basedefs/time.h.html CLOCKS_PER_SEC] as {{c|1'000'000}}, regardless of the actual precision of {{lc|std::clock()}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;ctime&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;locale&gt;

int main()
{
    const std::clock_t cps{CLOCKS_PER_SEC};
    std::cout.imbue(std::locale("en_US.utf8"));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; cps &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
1,000,000
}}
